channel.title: Antti J. Jokinen on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Antti J. Jokinen on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Benjamin Ree, Baldvin Z, Antti J. Jokinen and Linda Hambäck Bolster New Nordic Films Pitch Slate Whose Full Program Is Revealed
item.description: For its 31tst edition, New Nordic Films, the Norwegian International Film Festival’s industry confab, will be hitting new heights with a stronger than ever lineup of projects and completed titles
